name: Ft_transcendence
description: ft_transcendence is the ultimate project in the 42 common core curriculum, challenging students to create a feature-rich web application centered around the classic game Pong. This project combines various modern web technologies to create a complete multiplayer gaming experience with social features.

name: Inception
description: Inception is a project aimed at introducing students to the concepts of system containerization and orchestration using **Docker**. The objective is to create a secure and efficient multi-container environment that mimics a small-scale web hosting setup.
